text: The wise does at once what the fool does finally.
The eye cannot see itself without a reflection.
The more you know yourself, the more clarity there is.
A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
The man on top of the mountain didn't fall there.
Failure is instructive. The person who really thinks learns quite as much from his failures as from his successes.
The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
When you can't control what's happening, challenge yourself to control the way you respond to what's happening. That's where your power is.
Like a snake that sheds its skin, let go of past failures and emerge renewed.
The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Yesterday is already a dream, and tomorrow is only a vision, but today, well lived, makes every yesterday a dream of happiness and every tomorrow a vision of hope.
